posts.title: âš¡  OpenUtau Lunai 0.1.3.1 update has been released!
posts.content: âš¡ OpenUtau Lunai 0.1.3.1 update has been released! This is a test build. You may encounter bugs and crashes when using it This update includes a complete redesign of the phoneme panel for easy work with DiffSinger voicebanks! You can also hide phoneme language tags in Preferences -> DiffSinger You can simply open your OpenUtau Lunai to receive the update notification, or install it here: https://github.com/keirokeer/OpenUtau-DiffSinger-Lunai/releases/tag/0.1.3.1

She has her own lore from the Lunai universe, which tells how she can control levitation and many other interesting things that you will learn about later. Stay with us! ðŸ‘€

posts.title: <a:Vi_notify:977103248202809435>  **OpenUtau Lunai 0.1.3.0 update has been released!**
posts.content:
<a:Vi_notify:977103248202809435>  **OpenUtau Lunai 0.1.3.0 update has been released!**

*This is a test build. You may encounter bugs and crashes when using it*

The build has been updated to the latest test features in original StAkira's OpenUTAU, and some unreleased pull requests have been added. The most interesting:

- **Piano roll** is now **attachable** to main window
- **Custom themes** *(not sure if they will work properly)*
- **Track expressions**
- DiffSinger **Refined Phonemizer**
- DiffSinger **Portuguese BRAPA Phonemizer**
- **Liaison support** to **French Millefeuille Phonemizer**
- Many **bugs** have been **fixed** (but others appeared)

You can simply open your OpenUtau Lunai to receive the update notification, or install it here:
https://github.com/keirokeer/OpenUtau-DiffSinger-Lunai/releases/tag/0.1.3.0

posts.title: Website Update
posts.content:
The LUNAI Project website has been completely redesigned with new features.

We've focused on creating a better user experience for all our visitors.

posts.title: Update v170 is out!
posts.content: The new update brings a lot of new features: improved quality, support for new languages, optimization, and a whole bunch more, which we'll be writing a separate post about later.
